metadata.title: Solid Phase Synthesis of Dual Labeled Peptides: Development of Cell Permeable Calpain Specific Substrates

abstract.original_text: A step-by-step evaluation of dual-labeled FRET substrates for the protease calpain is reported. The study led to cell permeable selections, with optimized specificity and effectiveness for the target enzyme, and improved stability to non-specific degrading enzymes.

sentences.segment_text: A step-by-step evaluation of dual-labeled FRET substrates for the protease calpain is reported .
The study led to cell permeable selections ,
with optimized specificity and effectiveness for the target enzyme ,
and improved stability to non-specific degrading enzymes .
